DOC.brief_summary: This randomized trial is designed to identify the safety and efficacy of single port laparoscopic surgery in colon cancer compared with conventional laparoscopic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Single Port Laparoscopic Surgery in Colon Cancer
DOC.criteria: pathologic proven colon cancer Tumor located in distal transverse colon, splenic flexure, and descending colon distant metastasis acute obstruction and/or perforation associated with FAP or HNPCC synchronous malignancy ASA score 3 or 4 pregnancy no consent
